days.prayer: Ọbàtálá, guide me through this sacred cycle of purity, new beginnings
At this full moon, Ọbàtálá, let your power shine through me
Ọbàtálá, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Ògún, guide me through this sacred cycle of war, iron, labor
At this full moon, Ògún, let your power shine through me
Ògún, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Ṣàngó, guide me through this sacred cycle of thunder, fire, justice
At this full moon, Ṣàngó, let your power shine through me
Ṣàngó, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Ọya, guide me through this sacred cycle of winds, change, transformation
At this full moon, Ọya, let your power shine through me
Ọya, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Yemọja, guide me through this sacred cycle of waters, motherhood, fertility
At this full moon, Yemọja, let your power shine through me
Yemọja, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Ọ̀ṣun, guide me through this sacred cycle of rivers, love, prosperity
At this full moon, Ọ̀ṣun, let your power shine through me
Ọ̀ṣun, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Èṣù, guide me through this sacred cycle of crossroads, communication, opportunity
At this full moon, Èṣù, let your power shine through me
Èṣù, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Ọ̀sányìn, guide me through this sacred cycle of healing, herbs, medicine
At this full moon, Ọ̀sányìn, let your power shine through me
Ọ̀sányìn, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Olókun, guide me through this sacred cycle of ocean depths, wisdom, mysteries
At this full moon, Olókun, let your power shine through me
Olókun, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Òrìṣà Òkò, guide me through this sacred cycle of agriculture, earth, harvest
At this full moon, Òrìṣà Òkò, let your power shine through me
Òrìṣà Òkò, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Ọ̀ṣọ́ọ̀sì, guide me through this sacred cycle of hunting, forest, tracking
At this full moon, Ọ̀ṣọ́ọ̀sì, let your power shine through me
Ọ̀ṣọ́ọ̀sì, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Ọba, guide me through this sacred cycle of river unity, marriage, loyalty
At this full moon, Ọba, let your power shine through me
Ọba, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
Òrúnmìlà, guide me through this sacred cycle of wisdom, divination, knowledge
At this full moon, Òrúnmìlà, let your power shine through me
Òrúnmìlà, as this cycle ends, prepare my spirit for renewal
